definition: fat (e.g. pork fat)/fatty meat/(fig.) a gold mine/cash cow
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Just after a few days, the cat wanted that fat.
sentences.chinese: 没过几天，猫想要那罐肥肉了。

sentences.english: That cloud looks like the fat I put on during the cruise.
sentences.chinese: 那片云象我在出巡游期间长出的肥肉。

sentences.english: I still have more pounds to drop, but I can't complain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我还有很多肥肉要减掉，但我并没有抱怨。

sentences.english: But for this "fat meat", the banks also feel that would be wasteful.
sentences.chinese: 但对于这块“肥肉”，各家银行又总觉得弃之可惜。

sentences.english: Because he covereth his face with his fatness, and maketh collops of fat on his flanks.
sentences.chinese: 是因他的脸蒙上脂油，腰积成肥肉。

sentences.english: Muscles come and go; flab lasts.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉来了又走，肥肉却坚持到了最后。

sentences.english: With companies moving business online, the Internet has become a source of profit for them. We all know how this works.
sentences.chinese: 随着公司把业务搬到线上，因特网成了一块肥肉。

sentences.english: The richest creamiest fat in the world. Fat of the land.
sentences.chinese: 这是世界上脂肪最高的肥肉。

sentences.english: I hate fatty pork and never eat any.
sentences.chinese: 我最腻味肥肉，从来不吃。

sentences.english: Transfer brisket, fat side up, to large roasting pan.
sentences.chinese: 把牛胸肉有肥肉的一面向上放入大烤盘中。

sentences.english: Still descend hang, the fat meat of that Tuo.
sentences.chinese: 还下垂了，那一坨的肥肉啊。

sentences.english: The way to get rid of body fat in specific places is to have different parents .
sentences.chinese: 要想身体的某些部位少长肥肉，你得把老爸老妈换了。

sentences.english: Choose pork chop with fatty meat for a better result.
sentences.chinese: 拣带肥肉的猪扒有较佳效果。

sentences.english: Not long after this, the cat wanted to eat the fat again.
sentences.chinese: 在这不久之后，猫又想吃那罐肥肉了。

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
